DSSSB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 615 Caretaker, Assistant, Pharmacist and Other Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 06, 2025, 16:18 IST
 Delhi Subordinate Service Selection Board
 615 Jobs |  Posted On : 06-Aug-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 18,000 to 151,100




FOLLOW

The Delhi Subordinate Service Selection Board (DSSSB) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 615 Statistical Clerk, Surveyor, Stenographer, Assistant Librarian, Caretaker, Forest Guard, Account, Work Assistant, Music Teacher, Assistant Security Officer, and Other Posts. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, 12th, Diploma, Any Degree, CA, MBA, Post Graduation, B.Ed. can apply for the DSSSB Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government JObs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Delhi.

DSSSB Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Statistical Clerk	11	Any Degree
Assistant Public Health Inspector	78	12th, Diploma
NAib Tehsildar	01	Any Degree
Assistant Security Officer	02	10th Pass
Technical Supervisor	09	Diploma, Degree
Assistant Accounts Officer	09	CA, ICWA, CS, MBA, Post Graduation
Senior Investigator	07	Post Graduation
Stenographer	01	10th Pass
Assistant Superintendent	93	Any Degree
Caretaker	114	10th Pass
Forest Guard	52	10th, 12th
Junior Engineer	50	Diploma, Any Degree
Inspecting Officer	16
Pharmacist	13	10th Pass, Diploma
Accountant	02	Any Degree
For more vacancy details and educational qualifications, visit the official notification.

Age Limit for the DSSSB Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 18 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 37 years.

Age Relaxation

OBC Candidates: 3 Years
SC/ ST Candidates: 5 Years
PwBD (UR/ EWS) Candidates: 10 Years
PwBD (OBC) Candidates: 13 Years
PwBD (SC/ST) Candidates: 15 Years

Selection Process for the DSSSB Recruitment 2025

Computer-Based Test/Exam (Tier-I & Tier-II)
Skill Test
Physical Standard Test
Driving Test
Trade Test
Document Verification
Medical Examination
Interview

Salary Structure for the DSSSB Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 18,000 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 1,51,100 /- per month.

Application fee for the DSSSB Recruitment 2025

For General Candidates: Rs. 100/-
For SC,/ ST/ PwBD & Ex-Serviceman & Women Candidates: Nil
How to Apply for the DSSSB Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Assistant Librarian notification 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility Criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Register with your email and password.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Upload the required documents to the application form
Pay the application fee( if applicable).
Submit the application form and note down the application number for further reference.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	18-08-2025
Last Date of Application	16-09-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
